comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: What does this Photo Represent ?   Hopefully the Children were NOT being loaded onto the trains by the Germans.     Was it a school photo of a trip or what was it about ??

comment.author: 31748428@N07
comment._content: In Sweden I hade thought it was children from Finland. But this is Norway. Did Norway take any children from Finland?

comment.author: 53499944@N00
comment._content:
From the above URL, caption for this photo in English:
A number of Norwegian children were sent to Sweden during or straight after the war to receive treatment or to improve their nutrition. (Source: Norske Kvinners Sanitetsforening PA-0379/U/L001)

comment.author: 34918130@N07
comment._content: Looking at this Photo I could tell they are Norwegian Children.    Loading them onto a train made me remember what happened to so many in Germany.     Also looking close to the Children they do not look sick or underfed.   It could have also been a manuever to get the Innocent Norwegian Children out of Norway.  When the Germans invaded Norway , everyone was effected.     It is a Historical Photo that all Norwegian question.     Mange Takk pa the information.
